name: Fudge's Football Frenzy: Fudge Rises
description:
This game was originally a school project that has grown to have a life of its own. The theme and main character, Fudge, were inspired by a sketch from the comedy duo Key and Peele. The original Fudge's Football Frenzy had only 5 levels with a single mode. This remake entitled "Fudge Rises" includes:

  • several additional levels
  • campaign/story mode
  • time attack
  • zombie mode
  • ability to stiff-arm and juke
  • "Fudge vision"

The tutorial will show users how to effectively use Fudge's abilities!
